pkmkdoc.description:
This will install the Aquamacs Command Line Tools, "aquamacs" and "emacsclient". You can then use the commands from any shell to edit a file in Aquamacs on the local machine. "emacsclient" is used by other applications to interact with Aquamacs Emacs.
Note that this "emacsclient" (Emacs version 23) is incompatible with Emacs 22.x and Aquamacs 1.x. Conversely, pre-23 emacsclient tools are not compatible with newer Aquamacs versions. No graphical tool is provided to undo the upgrade to the new emacsclient.

choice.title: /usr/local/bin/aquamacs
choice.description: Note that /usr/local/bin is not necessarily in your PATH by default.

choice.title: /usr/local/bin/emacsclient
choice.description: Note that /usr/local/bin is not necessarily in your PATH by default.
